attributes.additional_details: Get rid of covid-19 passports don't want to catch covid stay at home ma it's easy see don't ruin it for everyone else who haven't been vaccinated it's their choice
attributes.background: Well basically it's not fair are on people who I don't have the vaccine they might not agree with it it like the rest of the country as you can't force people to have Vaccines

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Do not make vaccination against Covid-19 mandatory: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602282
